column1: Ponto Baggins was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Ponto was the eldest son of Posco Baggins and Gilly Brownlock and the father of Angelica Baggins. They attended the Bilbos Farewell Party together.
After Frodo Baggins left the Shire after the War of the Ring
column2: Ponto became the head of the Baggins Family
column4: as Bag End had passed to Samwise Gamgee.
